problem.p: A small ball of mass m is suspended on a light long string of length l. Initially, the string makes the angle θ with the vertical and the ball is held at rest. The ball is then released.
Part 1. In order to find the tension of the string at the moment when the ball passes its lowest position, which concepts/ideas are most useful?
